Class DrivePackage

java.lang.Object
com.amilesend.onedrive.resource.DriveItemType
com.amilesend.onedrive.resource.DriveItemFolderType
com.amilesend.onedrive.resource.DrivePackage
public class DrivePackage extends DriveItemFolderType
A wrapper around a DriveItem that represents a package (OneNote).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DrivePackage(DriveItem delegate)
    Creates a new DrivePackage that wraps the given getDelegate() DriveItem.
